title: bipolar ping (pls help)
body:
My ping has been acting up this past week in a very strange way. 

When starting a game and even in mid to late game I'll be running a nice 60-80ms. However, as soon as one ability is thrown out (even if it's just me alone farming minions) especially during combat the game will rocket up to an average of 250-300ms, hitting record highs of 500+. 

It's driving me insane and making me not want to play league anymore because I simply can't play.

replies.body: It sounds like you might be experiencing some packet loss so the game isn't able to communicate what's happening on screen properly.  For your specific issue, I recommend running a[ Log Reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to find out what's happening.  The results will also provide a series of troubleshooting steps to help out.  Hopefully, we'll get your ping feeling better!
